review:
Dr Venkateswara Reddy diagnoses the problem accurately and ensures the person is comfortable during the procedure. Doctor communicates the details of the problem thoroughly and recommends the exact solution.

The staff here are cooperative and friendly.

I recommend Dr Venkateshwara Reddy any given day.

Dr Venky Reddy exhibits a very caring and comforting attitude towards his patients, putting them at ease throughout the treatment process. He takes time to explain the various options available and details of the procedure,  which goes to build up mutual trust and confidence, so essential for everlasting relationship. A gentleman to the core!

Doctor is  very clear in communicating in simple words and very confident about the success of the treatment.  Without  much of formalities  he attends to his patients  instilling confidence  in them  about the procedure.  He keeps the patient about  his dental status at every stage and  I feel homely  at his unassuming  nature. Surely a patient will be safe in his hands .  When I first met him years back he had advised me to go for a few implantation.  I  contacted a few to know about their experience  of implantation  done elsewhere  which was negative.  So I hesitated to undergo as I am aged. I only underwent rootcanal  for a few few years back which was done excellently  by Dr. Reddy.  Having  convinced  I
 gathered courage  and went to him  for implantation.  I never expected that it would be done  painlessly.   Now  I a man of 84 is back with sweet sixteen teeth. Thanks to Dr. Venkateswara Reddy.
reply_text: Thank you sir! Your kind words mean a lot to us.

review:
We came all the way from the city of Coimbatore to consult Dr . A V Reddy . He has an excellent team , so courteous and friendly . Appointments are kept perfectly !
We are very senior patients and we had absolutely painless dental surgery ( Implants ) . Any day we will recommend the Dental Venue particularly for the Implants .

1. Communication was very good. Cleared all my various doubts.
2. Patient and thorough.
3. Gentle.
Thank you Doctor.
The doctor explained the whole procedure in detail and the whole thing went of very smoothly. there were no surprises
